# GRAPHICS::SET_PARTICLE_FX_BULLET_IMPACT_LODRANGE_SCALE

## Summary
Sets the range/lod scale used for the bullet impact effects (set to 1.0 for authored range/lods)

## Parameters
* **FLOAT** scale
